Help & Messages File Creation Utility

Before you do anything read "Manual.pdf"

Use this utility to create a file containing the text for dialogue boxes. These dialogues are used throughout Rayserve to provide information, help, or warning messages.

The default messages are already displayed in the form below. Either edit this text or create new messages then press the "Create Message File" button. After you have saved the message file check the results with the Message Viewer. When you are satisfied with the results move the file to ..\Webwright\Blpro\Program\ subdirectory.
